title: Московские окна
overview: 1964 - Olya Usoltseva comes to Moscow from her native Orlovka with a great desire to continue the family tradition - to get a medical education, with a big dream of making friends with the capital, with the address of her aunt Galina Semyonovna and with a bottle of "Orlovsky balm" - a panacea for all diseases, invented by grandfather Semyon - rural paramedic.
